pageContext.name: whitman
pageContext.prefixed:
<tei-TEI xmlns:xi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XInclude" data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="TEI" data-origatts="xmlns xmlns:xi">
   <tei-teiHeader data-origname="teiHeader">
      <tei-fileDesc data-origname="fileDesc">
         <tei-titleStmt data-origname="titleStmt">
            <tei-title level="m" type="main" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">Live Oak, with Moss.</tei-title>
            <tei-title level="m" type="sub" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">a machine readable transcription</tei-title>
            <tei-author data-origname="author">Walt Whitman</tei-author>
            <tei-editor data-origname="editor">Steven Olsen-Smith</tei-editor>
            <tei-respStmt data-origname="respStmt">
               <tei-resp data-origname="resp">Transcription</tei-resp>
               <tei-name xml:id="sos" id="sos" data-origname="name" data-origatts="xml:id">Steven Olsen-Smith</tei-name>
            </tei-respStmt>
         </tei-titleStmt>
         <tei-publicationStmt data-origname="publicationStmt">
            <tei-p data-origname="p">Excerpt extracted and modified for training purposes from a digital edition published in
            Scholarly Editing, Vol. 33. 
            Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License</tei-p>
         </tei-publicationStmt>
         <tei-sourceDesc data-origname="sourceDesc">
            <tei-bibl data-origname="bibl">
               <tei-author data-origname="author"> Walt Whitman </tei-author>
               <tei-title data-origname="title">MSS3829 Leaves of Grass, Volume 1, item 60</tei-title>
               <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature, Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library, University of Virginia</tei-orgName>
            </tei-bibl>
         </tei-sourceDesc>
      </tei-fileDesc>
   </tei-teiHeader>
   <tei-text data-origname="text">
      <tei-body data-origname="body">
         <tei-pb n="1" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
         <tei-ab data-origname="ab">
            <tei-lg data-origname="lg">
               <tei-head data-origname="head">VI.</tei-head>
               <tei-lg data-origname="lg">
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">What think you I have</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">taken my pen to record?</tei-l>
               </tei-lg>
               <tei-lg data-origname="lg">
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">Not the battle-ship,<tei-note n="1" data-origname="note" data-origatts="n">Some battleship</tei-note> perfect-</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">model'd, majestic, that I saw</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">to day arrive in the offing,</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">under full sail,</tei-l>
               </tei-lg>
               <tei-lg data-origname="lg">
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">Nor the splendors of the past<tei-note n="2" data-origname="note" data-origatts="n">Another note</tei-note>
                  </tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">day—nor the splendors of</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">the night that envelopes me—</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">Nor the glory and growth of</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">
                     <tei-placeName ref="#city" data-origname="placeName" data-origatts="ref">the great city</tei-placeName> spread around</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">me,</tei-l>
               </tei-lg>
               <tei-lg data-origname="lg">
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">But the two <tei-del data-origname="del">young</tei-del> men I saw</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">to-day on the pier, parting</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">the parting of dear friends.</tei-l>
               </tei-lg>
               <tei-lg data-origname="lg">
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">The one <tei-subst data-origname="subst">
                        <tei-del data-origname="del">who remained</tei-del>
                        <tei-add data-origname="add">to remain</tei-add>
                     </tei-subst> hung on</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">the other's neck and passionately</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">kissed him—while the one</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">who departed to depart tightly prest the</tei-l>
                  <tei-l data-origname="l">one who remained to remain in his arms.</tei-l>
               </tei-lg>
            </tei-lg>
         </tei-ab>
      </tei-body>
   </tei-text>
   <tei-standOff data-origname="standOff">
      <tei-listPlace data-origname="listPlace">
         <tei-place xml:id="city" id="city" data-origname="place" data-origatts="xml:id">
            <tei-p data-origname="p">Some city.</tei-p>
         </tei-place>
      </tei-listPlace>
   </tei-standOff>
</tei-TEI>
